Text:
Thank you for posting, works perfectly.

For those who don't know, to add the .reg file to the system registry, just double click it and follow the two step thing that pops up.

Didn't work without the crack which is not included in this download. Got the cracked, applied it and the game worked, but when I get to the main screen my mouse cursor disappears and I then obviously can't play. Any possible solutions?

@Tamgoon
the crack isnt needed

revert all files to the ones included in the .rar
run 'romainum 1.rar' to add it to your registry
then run the game, it may patch or do the verification thing and it will work
i cant regist without internet connection
